item.title: Practical Photography for Absolute Beginners: 9 Courses in 1
item.description: === Students reviews on this course === "I had a great love for this course. Through this photography course, I learned so many new things that I never heard of. The teaching method is very simple and beautiful which can be learned easily by anyone." -- Naveen Yes "Awesome all are understanding and point to point" -- Naman Verma "It was great course. I now have a better understanding as to which camera to purchase.

item.title: Complete Photography Masterclass: 4 courses in 1
item.description: ----- Our students reviews regarding this course ------ "fantastic o am learn a lot from this lecture.. I always think i know a lot about photography but when i follow this course which is so easy to understant.. now i feel i know nothing... thanks for the explanations" -- Eva "It's good and straight to the point.. and covers a lot of basic aspects you might need in photography and photo editing.
